jobDescription: Summary: DRIVIN Data Engineering team is looking for a strong technical leader to help drive the next generation of data science platform for KAR. The perfect candidate would be knowledgeable in Big Data and classic Data Warehousing techniques, proficient in AWS technologies, and possess strong leadership and mentoring skills.  In addition to leading the team, this person will be relied on to help prioritize and set delivery schedules and working closely with Product Owners and Data Science to drive discovery on initiatives and align the teams for success.  DRIVIN Data teams are using Python, SQL, Spark, EMR, ECS, Redshift, Elastic Search and Postgres to build an enterprise wide Data Science and Data Analytics platform. This team supports the internal Data Science and product teams, and also provides data engineering best practices across the KAR enterprise.
